comments:
Using 0611, I got the following stack trace when I paste by mistake a full path
(D:\eclipse2.1\eclipse\plugins\org.eclipse.jdt.core_2.1.0) inside the project
name field of a java application launching configuration. After that I got
several times the same failure.
